name: Rolling Paper Ball.IO - New Adventure In The SKY 2
name_original: Rolling Paper Ball.IO - New Adventure In The SKY 2
description:
A new challenging and interesting game in the vast sky.
There are many traps and barriers and make you addicted.
It is a game that pushes the boundaries of your speed and reaction.
Now, let's control the ball and conquer the world by overcoming challenges.
Tab to begin and the ball will jump once and just like fly in the vast sky.
Double tab and double jump.
Control the ball to avoid the barriers and traps.
Pass the levels you will get the pleasure.
Nice pass-time little game.
